original_text:
And as for the fact that he raised him from the dead, no more to return to corruption, he has spoken in this way,
“‘I will give you the holy and sure blessings of David.’
korean_text: 또 하나님께서 죽은 자 가운데서 그를 일으키사 다시 썩음을 당하지 않게 하실 것을 가르쳐 이르시되 내가 다윗의 거룩하고 미쁜 은사를 너희에게 주리라 하셨으며

sentences.original_text: And as for the fact that he raised him from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽은 자들로부터 그를 일으켰다는 사실에 관하여는

sentences.original_text: no more to return to corruption
he has spoken in this way
the holy and sure blessings of David.'
